shapes.tabs.crowd_tab.run_tab_crowd() → None[source]

Run the crowd tab by invoking the main function.

This function is responsible for initializing and displaying the crowd tab within the application. It calls the main function to perform the necessary operations to set up and run the tab.

Returns

None

shapes.tabs.crowd_tab.update_crowd(boundaries: Polygon, num_agents: int) → Crowd[source]

Create and return a new Crowd object.

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab module

Custom Crowd Tab.

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab.add_agent(agent_type: AgentTypes) → None[source]

Add a new agent of the specified type to the session state.

Parameters

agent_typeAgentType

The type of agent to be added. It should be one of the predefined agent types.

Returns

None

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab.initialize_session_state() → None[source]

Initialize the session state for agents and current agent ID.

This function checks if the session state contains the keys 'agents' and 'current_agent_id'. If not, it initializes 'agents' as an empty list and 'current_agent_id' as None.

Returns

None

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab.main() → None[source]

Manage and visualize agents in a custom crowd simulation.

This function initializes the session state, manages the addition and removal of agents, adjusts parameters for each agent, and provides visualization and download options.

Features

  • Add and remove agents (pedestrians and bikes) via sidebar buttons.

  • Select an agent from the sidebar to adjust its parameters.

  • Adjust parameters specific to pedestrians (bideltoid breadth, chest depth) and bikes (wheel width, total length, handlebar length, top tube length).

  • Adjust translation (x, y) and rotation angle for the selected agent.

  • Visualize the current state of agents on the main page.

  • Download the plot as a PDF.

  • Backup data in various formats (JSON, XML, Pickle).

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab.remove_agent(selected_id: int) → None[source]

Remove an agent from the session state by its ID.

Parameters

selected_idint

The ID of the agent to be removed.

Returns

None

Side Effects

  • Modifies the 'agents' list in the session state by removing the agent with the given ID.

  • Updates 'current_agent_id' in the session state to the next valid agent ID or None if no agents remain.

  • Calls 'st.rerun()' if no agents remain to refresh the Streamlit app.

shapes.tabs.custom_crowd_tab.run_tab_custom_crowd() → None[source]

Execute the main function for the custom crowd tab.
